name: Endless Apocalypse
description:
Endless Apocalypse is a thrilling shooter game that takes you on a never-ending journey through different levels. Unlike zombie games, it features a unique set of enemies and bosses that require your quick reflexes and careful planning to defeat. The Classic graphics and 3D maps add to the immersive gameplay experience, while the weapon system and varying levels keep the game fresh and challenging. With an intuitive and gorgeous user interface, you can easily navigate through the game, picking your weapons, and blasting your way through waves of enemies.

SWAP AND COLLECT WEAPONS SYSTEM

Collect weapons and swap them while in the level of the game, each level will have different weapons to pick and each level will different weapons so it does not get boring with the same guns.

DESTROY THE ENEMIE/BOSSES

Pass through each levels and defeat all of the strong enemies trying to prevent you to escape to another world level,But becareful there a enemies that are big enought to end you quickly.

NEW MAPS IN EACH LEVELS/ESTER EGGS

The map are unique from every level you play, the more higer you get the longer it will take for you to escape the hell, you are getting into agains the enemies. You will ifnd you self exploring by different type themes and stun by the good looking detailed of the levels. Search for encrypted Words on each map.

HEALTH AND RADAR SYSTEM

Players will know if the enemies are getting close to you and you will have a health bar telling you how much of health you have and it also has a splash screen damage to let you know your getting hit.

LEADERBOARD/ACHIVEMENTS

The game will have a leaderboard so you can track you timer and compete with other players and you will earn achivements while your at it.
